thread.title: Tony Johnson Named General Manager at Kings Dominion

author: cnbc.com
title: Tony Johnson Named General Manager at Kings Dominion
text:
DOSWELL, Va., Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Cedar Fair Entertainment Company has appointed amusement park industry veteran Tony Johnson as general manager of the Kings Dominion amusement park in Doswell, Va. effective immediately. Johnson has served in positions of increasing responsibility at Cedar Fair parks throughout his career, most recently as corporate vice president of operations where he oversaw rides, water parks and security throughout the company's eleven amusement parks.
Tim Fisher, Cedar Fair's chief operating officer, said, "Tony Johnson is a superb executive with deep experience and leadership skills. Kings Dominion has an exciting 2018 season ahead, with the opening of its new Twisted Timbers hybrid roller coaster next month as well as the introduction of the immersive holiday experience WinterFest in November. I am confident in Tony's ability to execute these endeavors with excellence, grow the business and enhance the guest experience throughout the season."
Johnson began his amusement park career as a seasonal associate at Kings Dominion. He assumed roles of increasing responsibility in a number of Cedar Fair parks including California's Great America in Santa Clara, Calif. and Carowinds in Charlotte, N.C. Roles have included leading security, water parks, rides and maintenance operations in addition to overall park operations leadership. Tony graduated from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with a B.A. in education, as well as the Rappahannock Criminal Justice Academy. He currently serves on the International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (IAAPA) global security committee and the state of Virginia amusement device technical advisory committee.
About Kings Dominion and Cedar Fair Entertainment Company
Kings Dominion, located in central Virginia, is the region's premier amusement park featuring thrill rides, live entertainment, an all-inclusive water park and 14-acre children's area. Kings Dominion is owned and operated by Cedar Fair Entertainment Company (NYSE: FUN), a publicly traded partnership and one of the largest regional amusement-resort operators in the world. The Company owns and operates 11 amusement parks, two outdoor water parks, one indoor water park and four hotels. For more information, see www.cedarfair.com .
